          {
            "componentId": "customdialouge-sbppnnutk",
            "componentName": "customdialouge",
            "componentProps": {
              "newvalue": "",
              "warehouse_name": "{{ editingBinItem.warehouse }}",
              "current_qty": "{{ editingBinItem.actual_qty }}",
              "iconImage": "{{ selectedItem[0].image}}",
              "titleText": "{{ selectedItem[0].item_name}}",
              "subTitleText": "{{ selectedItem[0].item_code}}",
              "isOpen": "{{ isEditDialogOpen }}",
              "newQty": "{{ newQuantity }}"
            },
            "componentSlots": {},
            "componentEvents": {
              "blur": {
                "event": "blur",
                "action": "Run Script",
                "script": "// In the \"Run Script\" action for the \"document-created\" event\nconst { doctype, docname } = event.detail;\n\nfrappe.call({\n  method: \"wms.api.api.submitDoc\", // Make sure this path is correct!\n  args: {\n    doctype: doctype,\n    docname: docname\n  },\n  callback: function(response) {\n    if (response.message) {\n      // ✅ Use the new method from the documentation!\n      studio.showToast({\n        message: response.message,\n        type: \"success\" \n      });\n      // You can also close your dialog here if needed\n      // isEditDialogOpen.value = false;\n    }\n  },\n  error: function(err) {\n    // Also handle errors with a toast\n    studio.showToast({\n        title: \"Submission Failed\",\n        message: err.message,\n        type: \"error\"\n      });\n  }\n});"
              }
            },
            "blockName": "customdialouge",
            "children": [],
            "baseStyles": {
              "display": "flex",
              "flexDirection": "row",
              "justifyContent": "center",
              "alignItems": "center"
            },
            "rawStyles": {},
            "mobileStyles": {},
            "tabletStyles": {},
            "visibilityCondition": "",
            "classes": [
              "\"shadow-xl\"",
              "\"transition-all\"",
              "\"duration-300\"",
              "\"ease-in-out\"",
              "\"{{ inputs.isOpen ? 'opacity-100 scale-100' : 'opacity-0 scale-95' }}\""
            ],
            "isStudioComponent": true
          }
        ],
        "baseStyles": {
          "display": "flex",
          "flexDirection": "column",
          "flexShrink": 0,
          "height": "fit-content",
          "width": "100%",
          "justifyContent": "center",
          "alignItems": "center",
          "position": "absolute"
        },
        "rawStyles": {},
        "mobileStyles": {},
        "tabletStyles": {},
        "visibilityCondition": "isEditDialogOpen",
        "originalElement": "div",
        "classes": [
          "\"transition-opacity\"",
          "\"duration-300\"",
          "\"ease-in-out\"",
          "\"{{ inputs.isOpen ? 'opacity-100' : 'opacity-0 pointer-events-none' }}\""
        ]

                      {

                        "blockName": "container",
                        "children": [
                          {
                            "componentId": "Repeater-lp4qy3yoz",
                            "componentName": "Repeater",
                            "componentProps": {
                              "data": "{{ filteredItemsList }}",
                              "dataKey": "item_code",
                              "emptyStateMessage": "No matching items found."
                            },
                            "componentSlots": {
                              "default": {
                                "slotName": "default",
                                "slotContent": [
                                  {
                                    "componentId": "itemsicon-pvl1tuyfw",
                                    "componentName": "itemsicon",
                                    "componentProps": {
                                      "iconImage": "{{ dataItem.image }}",
                                      "titleText": "{{ dataItem.item_name }}",
                                      "subTitleText": "Code: {{ dataItem.item_code }}"
                                    },
                                    "componentSlots": {},
                                    "componentEvents": {
                                      "click": {
                                        "event": "click",
                                        "action": "Run Script",
                                        "script": "const matchingBins = bins.data.filter(bin => \n  bin.item_code === dataItem.item_code\n);\nselectedItemBins.value = matchingBins;\nconst totalQuantity = matchingBins.reduce((sum, currentBin) => {\n  return sum + currentBin.actual_qty;\n}, 0); \n\nselectedItem.value = []\nselectedItem.value.push({\n  ...dataItem,\n  total_qty : totalQuantity \n})\n\nconsole.log(\"selectedItem.value---------\")\nconsole.log(selectedItem.value)\nconsole.log(\"------selectedItem checks---------\")\nconsole.log(selectedItem.value[0].item_code)"
                                      },
                                      "mouseover": {
                                        "event": "mouseover",
                                        "action": "Run Script",
                                        "script": "event.currentTarget.style.transform = 'scale(1.05)'; event.currentTarget.style.boxShadow = 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 10px 15px -3px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 4px 6px -4px';"
                                      },
                                      "mouseout": {
                                        "event": "mouseout",
                                        "action": "Run Script",
                                        "script": "event.currentTarget.style.transform = 'scale(1)'; event.currentTarget.style.boxShadow = '';"
                                      },
                                      "undefined": {
                                        "action": "Run Script",
                                        "script": "selectedItem.value = dataItem;\nselectedItemBins.value = bins.data.filter(bin => bin.item_code === dataItem.item_code);"
                                      },
                                      "keydown": {
                                        "event": "keydown",
                                        "action": "Run Script",
                                        "script": "page.variables.selectedItem = dataItem;\npage.variables.selectedItemBins = bins.data.filter(bin => bin.item_code === dataItem.item_code);"
                                      }
                                    },
                                    "blockName": "itemsicon",
                                    "children": [],
                                    "baseStyles": {},
                                    "rawStyles": {},
                                    "mobileStyles": {
                                      "width": "140px",
                                      "flexShrink": 0
                                    },
                                    "tabletStyles": {},
                                    "classes": [],
                                    "isStudioComponent": true
                                  }
                                ],
                                "slotId": "Repeater-lp4qy3yoz:default",
                                "parentBlockId": "Repeater-lp4qy3yoz"
                              }

                                "slotContent": "<svg width=\"10px\" height=\"10px\" viewBox=\"0 0 36 36\" xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg\" xmlns:xlink=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink\" aria-hidden=\"true\" role=\"img\" class=\"iconify iconify--twemoji\" preserveAspectRatio=\"xMidYMid meet\" fill=\"#000000\"><g id=\"SVGRepo_bgCarrier\" stroke-width=\"0\"></g><g id=\"SVGRepo_tracerCarrier\" stroke-linecap=\"round\" stroke-linejoin=\"round\"></g><g id=\"SVGRepo_iconCarrier\"><path fill=\"#DD2E44\" d=\"M21.533 18.002L33.768 5.768a2.5 2.5 0 0 0-3.535-3.535L17.998 14.467L5.764 2.233a2.498 2.498 0 0 0-3.535 0a2.498 2.498 0 0 0 0 3.535l12.234 12.234L2.201 30.265a2.498 2.498 0 0 0 1.768 4.267c.64 0 1.28-.244 1.768-.732l12.262-12.263l12.234 12.234a2.493 2.493 0 0 0 1.768.732a2.5 2.5 0 0 0 1.768-4.267L21.533 18.002z\"></path></g></svg>",

              "blur": {
                "event": "blur",
                "action": "Run Script",
                "script": "// In the \"Run Script\" action for the \"document-created\" event\nconst { doctype, docname } = event.detail;\n\nfrappe.call({\n  method: \"wms.api.api.submitDoc\", // Make sure this path is correct!\n  args: {\n    doctype: doctype,\n    docname: docname\n  },\n  callback: function(response) {\n    if (response.message) {\n      // ✅ Use the new method from the documentation!\n      studio.showToast({\n        message: response.message,\n        type: \"success\" \n      });\n      // You can also close your dialog here if needed\n      // isEditDialogOpen.value = false;\n    }\n  },\n  error: function(err) {\n    // Also handle errors with a toast\n    studio.showToast({\n        title: \"Submission Failed\",\n        message: err.message,\n        type: \"error\"\n      });\n  }\n});"
              }
            },
            "blockName": "customdialouge",

                            "componentId": "Repeater-lp4qy3yoz",
                            "componentName": "Repeater",
                            "componentProps": {
                              "data": "{{ filteredItemsList }}",
                              "dataKey": "item_code",
                              "emptyStateMessage": "No matching items found."
                            },
                            "componentSlots": {
                              "default": {
                                "slotName": "default",
                                "slotContent": [
                                  {
                                    "componentId": "itemsicon-pvl1tuyfw",
                                    "componentName": "itemsicon",
                                    "componentProps": {
                                      "iconImage": "{{ dataItem.image }}",
                                      "titleText": "{{ dataItem.item_name }}",
                                      "subTitleText": "Code: {{ dataItem.item_code }}"
                                    },
                                    "componentSlots": {},
                                    "componentEvents": {
                                      "click": {
                                        "event": "click",
                                        "action": "Run Script",
                                        "script": "const matchingBins = bins.data.filter(bin => \n  bin.item_code === dataItem.item_code\n);\nselectedItemBins.value = matchingBins;\nconst totalQuantity = matchingBins.reduce((sum, currentBin) => {\n  return sum + currentBin.actual_qty;\n}, 0); \n\nselectedItem.value = []\nselectedItem.value.push({\n  ...dataItem,\n  total_qty : totalQuantity \n})\n\nconsole.log(\"selectedItem.value---------\")\nconsole.log(selectedItem.value)\nconsole.log(\"------selectedItem checks---------\")\nconsole.log(selectedItem.value[0].item_code)"
                                      },
                                      "mouseover": {
                                        "event": "mouseover",
                                        "action": "Run Script",
                                        "script": "event.currentTarget.style.transform = 'scale(1.05)'; event.currentTarget.style.boxShadow = 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 10px 15px -3px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 4px 6px -4px';"
                                      },
                                      "mouseout": {
                                        "event": "mouseout",
                                        "action": "Run Script",
                                        "script": "event.currentTarget.style.transform = 'scale(1)'; event.currentTarget.style.boxShadow = '';"
                                      },
                                      "undefined": {
                                        "action": "Run Script",
                                        "script": "selectedItem.value = dataItem;\nselectedItemBins.value = bins.data.filter(bin => bin.item_code === dataItem.item_code);"
                                      },
                                      "keydown": {
                                        "event": "keydown",
                                        "action": "Run Script",
                                        "script": "page.variables.selectedItem = dataItem;\npage.variables.selectedItemBins = bins.data.filter(bin => bin.item_code === dataItem.item_code);"
                                      }
                                    },
                                    "blockName": "itemsicon",
                                    "children": [],

                                    "rawStyles": {},

                                      "width": "140px",
                                      "flexShrink": 0
                                    },

                                    "classes": [],
                                    "isStudioComponent": true
                                  }
